" re 'A' 'a' '0' last 'last' this special style 'in single quotes' '|' '(' * +. {m,n}. (. :a{6})* 'a'. DOTALL (. s:. ) ^ MULTILINE $ MULTILINE foo foo$ foo. $ 'foo1
foo2
' MULTILINE $ 'foo
' * ab* + ab+. ab. *. +. '*' '+' '. ' <. *> '<a> b <c>' '<a>'. <. *. > '<a>' *+ ++. + '*' '+' '. ' '+' a*a 'aaaa' a* 'a' 'a' a* 'a' 'a' 'a' a*+a 'aaaa' a*+ 'a' 'a' x*+ x++ x. + (. >x*) (. >x+) (. >x. ) {m} a{6} 'a' {m,n} a{3,5} 'a' a{4,}b 'aaaab' 'a' 'b' 'aaab' {m,n}. 'aaaaaa' a{3,5} 'a' a{3,5}. {m,n}+ 'aaaaaa' a{3,5}+aa 'a' 'a' a{3,5}aa a{3,5} 'a' 'a' aa x{m,n}+ (. >x{m,n}) \ '*' '.
title: re — Regular expression operations.13.5
